name: A Cosmic Scourge: Galaxy-Eyes
text: At the beginning of the Duel, add 1 "Galaxy-Eyes Photon Dragon" to your Deck. Can be used if you control 2 or more monsters with 2000 ATK or higher. Return 1 "Galaxy-Eyes Photon Dragon" from your Graveyard to your hand. This Skill can only be used once per Duel.
